fragments.atf:
1'. [x x x x x x x x x x (x) {šim}{d}]nin#-urta [ina] KUŠ
#note: Ln. 1' // BAM 470 ln. 21'.
#tr.en: If DITTO, @i{mūṣu}-stone, @i{parzillu} ('iron') . . . (and) @i{nikiptu}-aromatic ('spurge') in a leather bag.
$ single ruling
2'. [x x x x x u₂?-r]a?-na {u₂}LAL KA A.AB.BA {šim}{d}MAŠ NITA₂ u MUNUS
#note: Ln. 2'-4' // KAR 56 ln. 5-11 // BAM 9 47-50.
3'. [x x x {u₂}]ak?#-tam?# {na₄}mu-ṣa UH₂.{d}ID₂ {u₂}LU₂.U₁₈.LU NUMUN {giš}bi-ni
4'. [x x x x] HI.HI PIŠ₁₀.{d}ID₂ SUHUŠ {giš}MA.NU DIŠ-niš SUD₂ ina MUD₂ {giš}EREN HI.HI EŠ-MEŠ-su-ma TI
#tr.en: If a man has been seized by a ghost: you parch (and) mix @i{urânu} ('anise'), @i{ašqulālu}-plant, @i{imbûʾ tâmti} ('sea algae'), male and female @i{nikiptu}-aromatic ('spurge'), @i{qan šalāli} (a kind of reed), @i{aktam}-plant, @i{mūṣu}-stone, @i{ruʾtītu} (a kind of sulphur), @i{amīlānu}-plant ('man-like' plant), seed from @i{bīnu}-tree ('tamarisk') (and) ox horn, (then) you pound @i{kibrītu} (a kind of sulphur) (and) root from @i{ēru}-tree together, you mix them in blood from @i{erēnu}-tree ('cedar'), you keep anointing him (with the mixture), and then he will recover.
$ single ruling
5'. [x x x x G]IDIM DAB-su SUHUŠ {u₂}KU₆ {na₄}mu-ṣa AN.BAR {na₄}ZALAG₂ ni-kip-ta₅ ina KUŠ
#note: Ln. 5' // BAM 470 ln. 22' // K.2492 ln. 2'-3'.
#tr.en: Poultice for (the case when) a man has been seized by a ghost: root from @i{urânu}-plant ('anise'), @i{mūṣu}-stone, @i{parzillu} ('iron'), @i{zalāqu}-stone ('shiny' stone) (and) @i{nikiptu} ('spurge') in a leather bag.
$ single ruling
6'. [DIŠ KIMIN A.RI].A# LU₂ ina {sig₂}AKA₃ NIGIN u# ina GU₂-šu₂ GAR-an
#note: Ln. 6' // BAM 470 ln. 23' // K.2492 ln. 4'.
#tr.en: If DITTO, you wrap human seed in tuft of wool and you put it on his neck.
$ single ruling
7'. DIŠ# NA# ŠU#.GIDIM#.MA DAB-su {na₄}mu-ṣa {šim}{d}MAŠ PIŠ₁₀.{d}ID₂ KA A.AB.BA {u₂}LAL
#note: Ln. 7'-9' // K.2492 ln. 5'-7'.
8'. I₃# SUMUN ZAG.DU₈ E₂ {d}AMAR.UTU ša₂ ZAG u GUB₃ 6 U₂-HI.A an-nu-ti₃ TI-qe₂
9'. DIŠ-niš SUD₂ ina I₃.GIŠ ŠEŠ₂-MEŠ-su-ma DIN-uṭ lat-kut
#tr.en: If a man has been seized by 'hand-of-ghost': @i{mūṣu}-stone, @i{nikiptu}-aromatic ('spurge'), @i{kibrītu} (a kind of sulphur), @i{imbûʾ tâmti} ('sea algae'), @i{urânu}-plant ('anise') (and) old grease from the right and left doorjambs of the Marduk temple - you take these six drugs, you pound them together, you keep anointing him with them in oil, and then he will recover. Tested (remedy).
$ single ruling
10'. DIŠ NA GIDIM DAB-su ana DIN-šu₂ ŠE₁₀ ŠAH ŠE₁₀ UR.GI₇ ŠE₁₀ UR.BAR.RA ŠE₁₀ KA₅.A A.GAR.GAR MAŠ.DA₃
#note: Ln. 10'-12' // K.2492 ln. 8'-10'.
11'. {u₂}KUR.RA NAGA.SI SI DARA₃.MAŠ PIŠ₁₀.{d}ID₂ ku-up-ra
12'. GIR₃.PAD.DU NAM.LU₂.U₁₈.LU {tug₂}NIG₂.DARA₂.ŠU.LAL₂ ina NE tu-qat-tar-šu₂
#tr.en: If a man has been seized by a ghost: in order to heal him, you fumigate him with pig dung, dog dung, wolf dung, fox dung, gazelle droppings, @i{nīnû}-plant ('mint'), @i{uḫūlu qarnānû} ('horned alkali'), stag horn, @i{kibrītu} (a kind of sulphur), @i{kupru} ('bitumen'), human bone (and) soiled rag over fire.
$ single ruling
13'. DIŠ NA ŠU.GIDIM.MA DAB-su {šim}LI PIŠ₁₀.{d}ID₂ DIŠ-niš GAZ SIM ina I₃.UDU ELLAG₂ MAŠ₂.NITA₂! HI.HI
#note: Ln. 13'-14' // K.2492 ln. 11'-13'.
14'. ina KUŠ SUR MUD₂ {giš}EREN IGI ŠEŠ₂ lu SAG.DU-su lu GU₂-su LAL-ma TI-uṭ
#tr.en: If a man has been seized by 'hand-of-ghost': you crush (and) sift @i{burāšu}-aromatic (a kind of juniper) (and) @i{kibrītu} (a kind of sulphur) together, you mix them in fat from the kidney of a male goat, you smear (the mixture) on a piece of leather, you rub blood from @i{erēnu}-tree ('cedar') on it, you bandage either his head or his neck, and then he will recover.
$ single ruling
15'. {šim}GUR₂.GUR₂ {šim}LI GAZI{sar} PIŠ₁₀.{d}ID₂ ZI₃ GIB₃ KA A.AB.BA PAP 6 U₂-HI.A
#note: Ln. 15'-16' // K.2492 ln. 14'-15' // BAM 9 ln. 64-65.
16'. GAZ SIM ina A GAZI{sar} tara-muk ina TUG₂-HI.A SUR-ri SAG.DU-su LAL-id
#tr.en: @i{kukru}-aromatic, @i{burāšu}-aromatic (a kind of juniper), @i{kasû}-herb ('tamarind'), @i{kibrītu} (a kind of sulphur), flour from @i{kibtu} ('wheat') (and) @i{imbûʾ tâmti} ('sea algae') - altogether six drugs, you crush (and) sift them, you soak them in juice from @i{kasû}-herb ('tamarind'), you smear (the mixture) on a piece of fabric (and) you bandage his head with it.
$ single ruling
17'. [x] {šim#}x x (x) ŠIM-HI.A x x [...]
#tr.en: . . . aromatics . . .
